AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqsed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for SED: Checks whether the machine has 64 bit kernel support.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has the Trusted Execution feature on.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqsecldap
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LDAP: Checks whether the system has LDAP configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_temporary_account_removal
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001001 (CAT II): AIX must automatically remove or disable temporary user accounts after 72 hours.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_unique_account_names
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001008 (CAT I): All accounts on AIX system must have unique account names.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_unique_user_ids
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001009 (CAT I): All accounts on AIX must be assigned unique User Identification Numbers (UIDs).

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_special_account_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001011 (CAT II): Direct logins to the AIX system must not be permitted to shared accounts, default accounts, application accounts, and utility accounts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ssh_replay_resistance
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001012 (CAT I): AIX must use the SSH server to implement replay-resistant authentication.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_emergency_account_removal
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001014 (CAT II): The AIX system must automatically remove or disable emergency accounts after the crisis is resolved or 72 hours.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_device_file_permissions
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001019 (CAT II): AIX device files and directories must only be writable by users with a system account or as configured by the vendor.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_interactive_user_ttys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001025 (CAT II): AIX must configure the ttys value for all interactive users.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_root_web_browsers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001032 (CAT II): AIX administrative accounts must not run a web browser, except as needed for local service administration.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ldr_preload_unset
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001037 (CAT II): The AIX root accounts list of preloaded libraries must be empty.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_null_passwords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001038 (CAT II): AIX must not have accounts configured with blank or null passwords.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_root_homedir
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001039 (CAT II): The AIX root accounts home directory (other than /) must have mode 0700.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_loginherald
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001041 (CAT II): AIX must display the Standard Mandatory DoD Notice and Consent Banner before granting local or remote login access to the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_loginherald_cde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001042 (CAT II): The Department of Defense (DoD) login banner must be displayed immediately prior to, or as part of, graphical desktop environment login prompts on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ssl_ldap_authentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001045 (CAT II): IF LDAP is used, AIX LDAP client must use SSL to authenticate with LDAP server.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_data_confidentiality
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001048 (CAT II): AIX must protect the confidentiality and integrity of all information at rest.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_time_synchronization
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001053 (CAT II): AIX must provide time synchronization applications that can synchronize the system clock to external time sources at least every 24 hours.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_session_lock
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001100 (CAT II): AIX must be configured to allow users to directly initiate a session lock for all connection types.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ssl_ldap_client_authentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001104 (CAT II): If LDAP authentication is required on AIX, SSL must be used between LDAP clients and the LDAP servers to protect the integrity of remote access sessions.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_certificate_authorities
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001105 (CAT II): AIX must only allow the use of DoD PKI-established certificate authorities for verification of the establishment of protected sessions.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_fips_validated_cryptography
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001108 (CAT II): AIX must implement NIST FIPS-validated cryptography.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_dodaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendations STIG-ID AIX7-00-002001(CAT II):AIX must produce audit records containing information for the events occured.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditspace
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendations STIG-ID AIX7-00-002008 (CAT II):AIX must produce audit records containing information for the events occured.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditconf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002202 (CAT II): AIX audit files must be set to "640" or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002015 (CAT II): Audit log files must be set to "660" or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_hosts_permissions
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002140 (CAT II): The AIX /etc/hosts file must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_hosts_group_own
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002141 (CAT II): The AIX /etc/hosts file must be group-owned by system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdpermitrootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002102(CAT II): AIX must not permit root login using remote access program ssh.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdclientaliveinterval
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002105(CAT II): AIX must configure SSH idle timeout interval.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdclientalivecountmax
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002105(CAT II): AIX must terminate all SSH sessions after 10 mins of inactivity.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdkerberosauth
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002107: (CAT II): AIX must disable Kerberos Authentication in SSH config file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdprotocol
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002104(CAT II): AIX SSH Server must use Protocol 2.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdbanner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001043 (CAT II): DoD login banner should be displayed during SSH, sftp and scp login sessions on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdciphers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003100 (CAT I): AIX SSH daemon must use FIPS 140-2 approved ciphers.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdmacs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002111 (CAT II): AIX SSH daemon must use FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hash algorithms.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshstart
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001124 (CAT I): AIX root passwords must never be passed over a network in clear text form.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdhostbasedauth
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002122 (CAT II): AIX SSH daemon must not use host based authentication.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdignorerhosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002121 (CAT II): AIX SSH daemon must be configured to disable users .rhosts files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdallowtcpfwd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002118 (CAT II): AIX must turn off TCP forwarding for SSH daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdstrictmodes
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002116 (CAT II) : AIX SSH daemon must perform strict mode checking of home directory configuration files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdverifyrevmap
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002115 (CAT II): AIX must turn on SSH daemon reverse name checking.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdx11forwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002117 (CAT II): AIX must turn off X11 forwarding for SSH daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdpermitemptypasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002120 (CAT II): The AIX SSH daemon must be configured to disable empty passwords.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshdgssapiauth
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002108 (CAT II): SSH daemon must disable GSSAPIAuthentication if not required on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audittimestamp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002012(CAT II): AIX must use internal clock to generate timestamp for audit records.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001125 (CAT II): AIX must enforce 24 hours/1 day as the minimum password lifetime.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_minupperalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001120 (CAT II): AIX must enforce password complexity by requiring atleast one upper case password.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_minloweralpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001121 (CAT II) : AIX must enforce password complexity by requiring that atleast one lowercase password.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_mindigit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001122 (CAT II): AIX must enforce password complexity by requiring that atleast one numeric character be used.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001123 (CAT II) :AIX must require a change of atleast 50% of the total number of characters when passwords are changed.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001126 (Cat II): AIX must enforce a 60 day maximum password lifetime restriction.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001127 (CAT II): AIX must prohibit password reuse for a minimum of five generations.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_minspecialchar
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001130 (CAT II): AIX must enforce password complexity by requiring that at least one special character be used.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_fipspasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001134 (CAT II): The password hashes stored on AIX system must have been generated using a FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashing algorithm.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_snmp_password
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001135 (CAT II): If SNMP service is enabled on AIX, the default SNMP password must not be used in the /etc/snmpd.conf config file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001136 (CAT II): AIX must require passwords to contain no more than three consecutive repeating characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_remote_login
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001137 (CAT I): AIX must be able to control the ability of remote login for users.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_fsmntoptions
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001139 (CAT II): AIX removable media, remote file systems, and any file system not containing approved device files must be mounted with the nodev option.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_process_id
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002004 (CAT II): AIX must produce audit records containing information to establish the source and the identity of any individual or process associated with an event.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_status
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002005 (CAT II): AIX must produce audit records containing information to establish the outcome of the events.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_recording
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002006 (CAT II): AIX must produce audit records containing the full-text recording of privileged commands.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_freespace
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002008 (CAT II): AIX must be configured to generate an audit record when 75% of the audit file system is full.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_events
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002016 (CAT II): AIX must provide audit record generation functionality for DoD-defined auditable events.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_report_gen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002036 (CAT II): AIX must provide a report generation function that supports on-demand audit review and analysis, on-demand reporting requirements, and after-the-fact investigations of security incidents.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ipv4_forwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002064 (CAT II): IP forwarding for IPv4 must not be enabled on AIX unless the system is a router.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ipv6_forwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002066 (CAT II): AIX must not have IP forwarding for IPv6 enabled unless the system is an IPv6 router.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rhosts_in_pam
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003139 (CAT II): The .rhosts file must not be supported in AIX PAM.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_disk_full_action
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002017 (CAT II): AIX must be configured so that the audit system takes appropriate action when the audit storage volume is full.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_tool_hash
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002028 (CAT II): AIX must verify the hash of audit tools.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_space_allocation
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002033 (CAT II): AIX must allocate audit record storage capacity to store at least one weeks worth of audit records, when audit records are not immediately sent to a central audit record storage facility.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_timezone
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002038 (CAT II): AIX must record time stamps for audit records that can be mapped to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audit_log_rotate
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002057 (CAT II): AIX audit logs must be rotated daily.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_homedir_owner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002085 (CAT II): All AIX interactive users home directories must be owned by their respective users.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_homedir_group
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002086 (CAT II): All AIX interactive users home directories must be group-owned by the home directory owner primary group.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_jfs2_efs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002096 (CAT II): AIX must encrypt user data at rest using AIX Encrypted File System (EFS) if it is required.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshd_installed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002097 (CAT II): AIX must protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information during preparation for transmission and maintain the confidentiality and integrity of information during reception and disable all non-encryption network access methods.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_revoked_keys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002110 (CAT II): AIX must setup SSH daemon to disable revoked public keys.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_privilege_separation
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002114 (CAT II): AIX must turn on SSH daemon privilege separation.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_host_authentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002123 (CAT II): The AIX SSH daemon must not allow RhostsRSAAuthentication.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_passwd_shells
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002103 (CAT II): All AIX shells referenced in passwd file must be listed in /etc/shells file, except any shells specified for the purpose of preventing logins.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshd_listen_address
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002124 (CAT II): If AIX SSH daemon is required, the SSH daemon must only listen on the approved listening IP addresses.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_system
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001010 (CAT I): The AIX SYSTEM attribute must not be set to NONE for any account.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX-00-001030 ( CAT II):AIX must not permit root login using remote access program rlogin.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_usrgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002072 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be group owned by system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_usrownership
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001018 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_binownership
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001018 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_bingroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002072 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be group owned by system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sbinownership
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001018 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sbingroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002072 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be group owned by system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_etcownership
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001018 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_etcgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002072 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be group owned by system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ucbownership
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001018 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ucbgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002072 (CAT II): AIX system files, programs, directories must be group owned by system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003029 (CAT II) : AIX must enforce a login delay of atleast 4 seconds between login prompts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001003 (CAT II): AIX must enforce the limit of three consecutive login attempts by a user before the account is locked.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_pwdalgorithm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001128 (CAT I): AIX must use loadable password algorithm (LPA) hashing algorithm.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_dictlist
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001132 (CAT II): AIX must prevent the use of dictionary words as passwords.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_shells
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003110 (CAT II): The /etc/shells file must exist and must be configured to use in login.cfg file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001129 (CAT I): AIX must enforce a minimum of 15 character password length.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_usrlibperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002088 (CAT II): AIX library files must have mode 0755.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_libperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002088 (CAT II): AIX library files must have mode 0755.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_nntpperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003013 (CAT II): AIX passwd.nntp file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ntppperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002090 (CAT II): AIX time synchronization configuration file must have mode 0640 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_varlogperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003006 (CAT II): AIX log files must have mode 0640 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_varadmperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003006 (CAT II): AIX log files must have mode 0640 less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002027 (CAT II): AIX audit tools must be set to 4550 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditbinperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002027 (CAT II): AIX audit tools must be set to 4550 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditcatperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002027 (CAT II): AIX audit tools must be set to 4550 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditconvperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002027 (CAT II): AIX audit tools must be set to 4550 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditmergeperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002027 (CAT II): AIX audit tools must be set to 4550 or less permissive

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditprperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002027 (CAT II): AIX audit tools must be set to 4550 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditselectperm

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003141 (CAT II): All AIX interactive users must be assigned a home directory in the passwd file and the directory must exist.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_routing
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003133 (CAT II): AIX must not run any routing protocol daemons unless the system is a router.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_umask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003137 (CAT II):AIX must define default permissions for all authenticated users.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_firewall
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003143 (CAT II):AIX must employ a deny-all, allow-by-exception policy for all owing connections to other systems.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_pmfahotplug
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003205 (CAT II): AIX operating system must accept and verify personal identity verification (PIV) credentials.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_mfaremote
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003202 (CAT II): AIX must be configured to use MFA for remote connections.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_authtype
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003201 (CAT II): AIX must be configured to authenticate using MFA.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_serverpem
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003204 (CAT II): The AIX operating system must be configured to use a valid server_ca.pem file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_icmptmstamp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003134 (CAT II): AIX must not process ICMP timestamp requests.
